Short Bio

I am a senior student at Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), Shanghai, China.

I major in Computer Science, and is from IEEE Honor Class in the School of Electronic Information and Electrical Engineering.

I am an undergraduate research assistant at the Intelligent Internet of Things(IIoT) of SJTU, and I am working under the guidance of Prof. Xinbing Wang now.

Area of Interests

My primary areas of interests in research include:

  • Large-scale Data Mining
  • Statistical Machine Learning
  • Representation Learning

My primary areas of interests in engineering include:

  • Data Wrangling
  • Web front-end Development
  • Mobile Application Development

About this site

This site is automatically generated by Jekyll into a static site when I push to Github repo. Posts are in Markdown and the source resides on GitHub.
